Package io.goobi.viewer.model.urlresolution

package io.goobi.viewer.model.urlresolution
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ViewerPath
    Stores the url path of a http request organized by its logical parts so application url, application name, view type and parameter urls can be retrieved independendly.
    ViewerPathBuilder
    This class offers static methods to create ViewerPaths from a http request.
    ViewHistory
    This class offers methods to store information about the current and previous html-view (page) in the session store The fullscreen view is explicitly excluded from the recorded views, since it acts only as a magnification of the image view, not as a seperate page
